Interface XProcStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XMLTransformer, com.xmlcalabash.core.XProcRunnable, com.xmlcalabash.core.XProcStep

    public interface XProcStep
extends com.xmlcalabash.core.XProcStep, XMLTransformer
